Name: Short-term consumption of sucralose with, but not without, carbohydrate impairs neural and metabolic sensitivity to sugar
Acknowledgements: This research was funded by NIH NIDCDR01 DC006706-06A1
ReferencesAndLinks: Jelle R. Dalenberg, Barkha P. Patel, Raphael Denis, Maria G. Veldhuizen, Yuko Nakamura, Petra C. Vinke, Serge Luquet, Dana M. Small. Short-term consumption of sucralose with, but not without, carbohydrate impairs neural and metabolic sensitivity to sugar. Cell Metabolism. 2020.
